Welcome! This is a repo to share the code that other members of the lab are working on. We can continuously update it with codes that we refer to often, questions we ask, or resources we find helpful. If you have a script you think might be useful to have on the site, please let me know via github or email and will push!

Click [here](torus_metaplot.html) for the code to torus_metaplot

Click [here](popsscropts.html) for the code to PoPs

Click [here](500kb.html) for the code to selecting by 500 kb blocks

Click [here](PRS-CT.html) for sample code to run PRS-CS

Click [here](PRS-CS.html) for sample code to run PRS-CT


I love these [5 Minute Stats](https://stephens999.github.io/fiveMinuteStats/) lessons to illustrate key concepts.

For a tutorial on how to run [mashR](https://stephenslab.github.io/mashr/articles/intro_mash.html) I like the eQTL vignette within this intro.
